title: commit bec403 causes 2%-4% in write-heavy workloads
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
commit bec40346e641f480b35c6a83bfe6e4fd169ddc01

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
1. deploy a TiDB Cluster with 3 TiDB + 3 TiKV
2. run bank, sysbench oltp_update_non_index/oltp_insert/oltp_update_index
### What did you expect?
No performance regression
### What did happened?
commit bec403 causes 2%-4% in write-heavy workloads: bank, sysbench oltp_update_non_index/oltp_insert/oltp_update_index
